plurals.name: kg_password_default_pin_message_multi_sim
plurals.item: Please enter the PIN for SIM card %1$d. %2$d attempts remaining.
"Please enter the PIN for SIM card %1$d. %2$d attempt remaining. If it is incorrect again, you'll need to contact the carrier to help unlock the device."

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PIN. %d attempts remaining.
"Incorrect SIM PIN. %d attempt remaining. You'll need to contact the carrier to help unlock the device if it is incorrect again."

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code_multi_sim
plurals.item: Incorrect PIN for SIM card %1$d. %2$d attempts remaining.
"Incorrect PIN for SIM card %1$d. %2$d attempt remaining. If it is incorrect again, you'll need to contact the carrier to help unlock the device."

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PUK code. %d attempts remaining. SIMs will be permanently disabled if it is incorrect again.
Incorrect SIM PUK code. %d attempts remaining. SIM will be permanently disabled if it is incorrect again.

plurals.name: kg_prompt_reason_time_password
plurals.item: The device has been locked for %d hours. Please confirm the password.

plurals.name: kg_prompt_reason_time_pin
